directions.step:
Blend together sugars, vanilla and cream cheese. Stir in nuts. Cut up apples into slices and soak for a few minutes in lightly salted water. This will help prevent browning. Dip away!!!!!
NOTES : This came from an aunt who never measures anything and I have adapted it. This is a real stand out as a fruit dip. I make it with fat free cream cheese and Grape Nuts (instead of nuts) for a lower fat version. Recipe by: Joy Sebastian Posted to MC-Recipe Digest V1 #671 by "Joy H. Sebastian" <Roux_Crew@CompuServe.COM> on Jul 14, 1997
